Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, in this post i will show you my new spaceplane SSTO the rockhead 1

target: SSTO which have high dv, low mass and looks cool.

info: mass: 15.7 t (in this version)

parts: 101

trust: 2*lv 909 2*turbojets

dv in orbit: around 2500 dv

karbonauts: 1

docking ?: this download none but easy to put 1 on the back.

the plane has a lot of dv for its size, able to go and return mun or land and return minmus.

has the abilty to get 125000 meter only with jet, need only a little trust to complete orbit.

very stable, has nice electric system and rcs.

its the first of its class if will be a need, i will make mome (bigger and better )

action groups: 1: jets

2: rockets

3: intakes 1

4: intakes 2

5: intakes 3

6: intakes 4

7: intakes 5

flight path: until 10000 meters 60 degrees then 30 until 12000 and then gain speed until orbit.

pictures:

download: '>

http://speedy.sh/TNNxR/rockhead-1.craft

fly safe

for more pictures vids and stuff pls post comment.
I would have called that the Pankake. But cool craft anyway i'm a huge fan of using wings as a box of sorts.
the pankake... dam goodd idea can i use it ?
i have notice the link don't work, here is a better one http://speedy.sh/9cxf7/the-pankake.craft
